short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and maintain multiple sets of custom instructions for ChatGPT's free web interface. Switch between them whenever you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to create and maintain multiple sets of custom instructions for use with ChatGPT's free web interface, and to switch between them whenever you want.

Click on the extension icon while logged into the free ChatGPT web UI, and you will be able to view a number of included custom instructions. You can edit or delete these, and add your own, and switch between them. The website itself only supports one custom instruction - hence this extension.
